items.content:
Welcome the Year of the Fire Horse with an elegant Lunar New Year celebration at Mangan All Day Dining. The Golden Dinner Buffet is thoughtfully curated to reflect the spirit of The House of Eight Fortunes, bringing together festive flavors, warm traditions, and a refined dining experience for a meaningful start to the year.

Join us on 16th February 2026 and enjoy this special dinner at IDR 588,000++ per person, complete with festive performances including Barongsai and Guzheng & Erhu.

Enjoy exclusive privileges with up to 20% off using selected bank cards, special benefits for MYJHL Members, and an Early Bird 30% OFF until 6th February 2026 *limited quota only.
items.excerpt: Welcome the Year of the Fire Horse with an elegant Lunar New Year celebration at Mangan All Day Dining. The Golden Dinner Buffet is thoughtfully curated to reflect the spirit of The House of Eight Fortunes.

items.content:
Celebrate love the Italian way at Al Gusto Italian Dining & Bar, where romance, flavor, and timeless elegance come together for an unforgettable Valentine’s evening.

On 14 February 2026, from 19.00 onwards, indulge in an intimate dining experience curated especially for couples. Set against a warm and romantic ambiance, the evening features a specially crafted Valentine’s Set Menu for IDR 1,880,000 net per couple, complemented by enchanting live entertainment.

Let the night unfold with:

  • A romantic dance performance
  • Soulful vinyl beats setting the mood
  • A live couple painting by Aling, capturing love in art

All thoughtfully designed to create a celebration that feels personal, meaningful, and beautifully unforgettable, with an exclusive 20% OFF privilege for MYJHL Members.

An evening of romance, flavor, and artistry — because love deserves to be celebrated beautifully.
items.excerpt: Celebrate love the Italian way at Al Gusto Italian Dining & Bar, where romance, flavor, and timeless elegance come together for an unforgettable Valentine’s evening on 14 February 2026.

meta.title: La Dolce Vita ‚Äî Al Gusto Italian Dining & Bar

items.title: La Dolce Vita ‚Äî Al Gusto Italian Dining & Bar

items.content:
As the Year of the Fire Horse approaches, a grand reunion unfolds in the Sky Ballroom. On 16 February 2026, from 18.30 onwards, celebrate Chinese New Year’s Eve with an exquisite set menu, refined Old Shanghai elegance, and thoughtfully curated festivities designed for meaningful moments together.

Indulge in an elevated evening for IDR 16,880,000++ per table (10 persons), featuring a spectacular line-up of cultural performances—including Barongsai, Kung Fu Tea Master, and Chinese Fan Dance—alongside a special guest performance by renowned Mandarin singer Vhien Audrey. The night is completed with a memorable family photo keepsake and an exclusive Best Costume Prize to honor timeless Old Shanghai style.

Exclusive Privileges:

  • Early Bird 30% OFF until 6 February 2026 *limited quota only

This Chinese New Year’s Eve, every detail is crafted with intention—so every celebration becomes a cherished memory.
items.excerpt: A Grandeur Chinese New Year’s Eve Celebration on 16 February 2026 with The House of Eight Fortunes alongside a special guest performance by renowned Mandarin singer Vhien Audrey.

meta.title: Chinese New Year ‚Äî The House of Eight Fortunes at Sky Ballroom

items.title: Chinese New Year ‚Äî The House of Eight Fortunes at Sky Ballroom

items.content:
As the Fire Horse ignites a year of bold new beginnings, Chinese New Year at JHL Solitaire unfolds in two beautifully crafted chapters — each with its own rhythm and character.

16 February 2026 — Chinese New Year’s Eve | 18.30 onwards

An elevated evening of celebration with our signature Set Menu, accompanied by Barongsai, Kung Fu Tea Master, and a special performance by the Chinese F1 Band, creating a night of grandeur, music, and festive energy.

From IDR 1,488,000++ per person
Early Bird 30% off until 6 February 2026
Special bank privileges up to 20% with BCA, Mandiri, BTN, OCBC and MYJHL Member privileges *T&C apply

17 February 2026 — Chinese New Year Day | Lunch

A more intimate continuation of the festivities with Set Menu or À La Carte dining, accompanied by Barongsai and Kung Fu Tea Master performances, perfect for family gatherings and refined daytime celebrations.

Two days. Two experiences. One unforgettable New Year shaped by tradition, artistry, and the spirit of the Fire Horse.
items.excerpt: As the Fire Horse ignites a year of bold new beginnings, Chinese New Year at Royal Eight Chinese Dining unfolds in two beautifully crafted chapters — each with its own rhythm and character.

items.content:
Rooted in heritage and lifted with meaning, our Yee Sang is crafted to reflect the vibrant spirit of the Fire Horse and the blessings of Eight Fortunes—bringing harmony, momentum, and togetherness to every toss at the table.

IDR 488,000++ for 5 persons | IDR 828,000++ for 10 persons
Carrots, peppers & spices, toasted sesame seeds, salmon, jellyfish, gohiong, plum peanuts, sliced vegetables, crackers, tangerine, taro, pomelo, onion oil, and white radish.

A graceful way to mark new beginnings, now prepared for your celebration at home.
items.excerpt: Rooted in heritage and lifted with meaning, our Yee Sang is crafted to reflect the vibrant spirit of the Fire Horse and the blessings of Eight Fortunes—bringing harmony, momentum, and togetherness to every toss at the table.

items.content:
Welcome the Year of the Fire Horse with Gift of Fortune, a refined Chinese New Year 2026 hamper curated to carry wishes of abundance, warmth, and auspicious beginnings. Each piece is thoughtfully chosen to reflect tradition wrapped in modern elegance—an exquisite way to send your blessings for the year ahead.

Prosperity Edition — IDR 1,988,000 NET
Golden Fortune Layers, Golden Pineapple Tart, Mandarin Fortune Jelly, Fire Horse Angpao, and Blessing Flame Candle

Harmony Edition — IDR 1,288,000 NET
Blessing Flame Candle, Golden Fortune Layers Tart, Mandarin Fortune Jelly

Let every detail speak of celebration, fortune, and a new chapter beautifully begun.

items.content:
Discover the pleasure of shared moments at Royal Eight Chinese Dining, where each dim sum is crafted with care, heritage, and refined technique. From delicate folds to perfectly balanced flavors, every bite reflects the artistry of authentic Chinese dining.

For a limited time, enjoy 50% off all dim sum selections, inviting you to linger longer, savor more, and celebrate the joy of togetherness around the table.

Offer Details

  • Weekdays: 11.00 – 15.00
  • Weekends: 18.00 – 21.00
  • Valid until 31 January 2026
  • Available for walk-in and reservation
  • Exclusive for MYJHL Members

Because some traditions are best shared—one dim sum at a time.

*Cannot be combined with other discounts.
items.excerpt: Discover the pleasure of shared moments at Royal Eight Chinese Dining, where each dim sum is crafted with care, heritage, and refined technique. For a limited time, enjoy 50% off all dim sum selections.

items.content:
At Royal Eight Chinese Dining, tradition is reimagined through craftsmanship and quiet confidence. One of our most celebrated signatures, BBQ Chicken Stories with Almond Friends Chicken, is a tribute to the art of roasting—where tender poultry meets a delicate glaze, finished with the gentle crunch of roasted almonds.

Each bite tells a story of balance and heritage, crafted with precision and served with understated elegance. A signature created for those who appreciate depth of flavor, refined technique, and timeless Chinese culinary artistry.

Discover a dish where tradition speaks softly with a lasting impression.
items.excerpt: At Royal Eight Chinese Dining, tradition is reimagined through craftsmanship and quiet confidence. Each bite tells a story of balance and heritage, crafted with precision and served with understated elegance.

meta.title: Signature Almond Fried Chicken ‚Äî Royal Eight Chinese Dining

items.title: Signature Almond Fried Chicken ‚Äî Royal Eight Chinese Dining

items.content:
At Le Bleu Café, every cake is a crafted expression of indulgence—where delicate textures, refined sweetness, and timeless technique come together. From our signature Mango Cheesecake, light and luminous, to the rich elegance of Black Forest, each creation is thoughtfully made to elevate every celebration.

Available through a pre-order system, our whole cake collection offers a curated selection of pâtisserie-style delights, perfect for intimate gatherings or meaningful moments worth savoring.

For personalized recommendations and detailed selections, please contact us directly—because some indulgences deserve a thoughtful beginning.
items.excerpt: At Le Bleu Café, every cake is a crafted expression of indulgence—where delicate textures, refined sweetness, and timeless technique come together.

items.content:
Begin the year with a stay crafted for those who value thoughtful luxury. As a MYJHL member, enjoy 15% off our Best Available Rate, designed to turn every moment into a refined escape at JHL Solitaire.

From January to March 2026, let comfort, elegance, and personalized hospitality welcome you—simply present your MYJHL membership profile upon redemption, matching the booker’s name.

Offer Period: 1 January – 31 March 2026

Because exceptional stays are best enjoyed with privileges made just for you.

*Terms & Conditions apply. This offer is not valid during festive periods, including Christmas, New Year, Chinese New Year, and Eid al-Fitri.
items.excerpt: Begin the year with a stay crafted for those who value thoughtful luxury. As a MYJHL member, enjoy 15% off our Best Available Rate, designed to turn every moment into a refined escape at JHL Solitaire.

items.content:
Step into the heart of Italy as Al Gusto Italian Dining & Bar invites you to experience Cucina dal Vivo — where every dish is crafted before your eyes with the art of live gueridon cooking.

From Monday to Friday, 18:00 – 21:00, let the sizzle, aroma, and flair of tableside creations set the stage for an unforgettable evening. Pair your experience with our signature cocktails or a fine glass of wine, available at a special price to complete your culinary journey.

Because every great story deserves a taste worth remembering.
items.excerpt: Step into the heart of Italy as Al Gusto Italian Dining & Bar invites you to experience Cucina dal Vivo — where every dish is crafted before your eyes with the art of live gueridon cooking. Let the sizzle, aroma, and flair of tableside creations set the stage for an unforgettable evening.

items.content:
Feeling like your fitness journey needs a reboot? This is your sign!

We're not just offering workouts, we're offering a community and a path to a stronger, healthier you.

At The Workout with Prime Fit Coaching, we're all about you — your goals, your schedule, your success. 

Starting at just IDR 250,000 net per person, you'll get:

  • A dedicated 1-on-1 personal coach
  • Guidance from our certified trainers

And because we believe in starting strong and sharing the love:

  • Enjoy 1 FREE session in your first month
  • Refer a friend and get a IDR 100,000 credit

We offer the flexibility to train on your schedule, leading to a proven path to transformation.
items.excerpt: Experience a personalized path to transformation, meticulously designed to help you achieve your goals in an environment of unparalleled support. This is more than a workout — it's an investment in a stronger, healthier, and more vibrant you.
items.subtitle: The Workout
items.title: Prime Fit Coaching ‚Äî The Workout

items.content:
Aged to Perfection, Crafted for the Connoisseur, indulge in an exquisite journey of flavor with our Signature Dry Aged selection at Al Gusto Italian Dining & Bar. Savor the bold, rich character of:

  • 28 Days Aged Flore’s Coffee-Marinated Wagyu Shorthorn MB7+ – IDR 988,000 net/pax
  • 30 Days Aged Tajima Organic Grass-Fed OP Ribs – IDR 988,000 net/pax
  • 45 Days Aged US Prime Grass-Fed Short Loin Steak – IDR 1,188,000 net/pax

Each cut is aged with precision and passion, designed to delight the most refined palates. Ask our team for the full aged menu selection — and enjoy a complimentary glass of Signature Cocktail to elevate your dining experience.
items.excerpt: Aged to Perfection, Crafted for the Connoisseur, indulge in an exquisite journey of flavor with our Signature Dry Aged Selection at Al Gusto Italian Dining & Bar

Savor a luxurious International Brunch Buffet every Sunday from 12:00 – 15:00 at Mangan All Day Dining, where culinary excellence meets refined indulgence with only IDR 688,000++ per person. Let live jazz melodies set the tone as you delight in a world of flavors, an enchanting Chef Junior Corner, and mesmerizing performances from a street magician.

items.content:
Empress China Bar offers a unique apothecary-themed experience that seamlessly blends ancient herbal wisdom with modern mixology. Drawing inspiration from traditional pharmacies, we create an atmosphere that is both intriguing and inviting. At Empress, our cocktails cater not only to alcohol enthusiasts but also to those seeking health benefits.

Our Apothecary Concosion Recommendation:
- Health and Beauty: Black Ace
- Pain Killers: Shu Wei Chao Ye
- Stress Reliever: Sundar Samarpan
- Stimulants: Carpe Diem
- Euphorics: Dandelion

Visit our instagram (@empresschinabar) for more information.
items.excerpt: At Empress, our cocktails cater not only to alcohol enthusiasts but also to those seeking health benefits. Come, experience, and taste our cocktails recommendation
